items.name: Shell
items.description: A glistening white shell, perfect for a souvenir.

items.name: Shovel
items.description: An old wooden shovel, it's seen better days.

items.name: Spear
items.description: A shiny iron spear, sharp and ready for use.

locations.name: Black Beach
locations.description: A beach with black sand, it's quite a sight.

items.name: Coconut
items.description: A coconut nut (is a giant nut), it's hard but nutritious.

items.name: Passion Fruit
items.description: A juicy ripe passion fruit, it's mouth-wateringly delicious.

npcs.name: Barry
npcs.description: An old sage that seems to know everything.
npcs.dialogue: You better make space for those stairs if you head into the forest, young fella...
